title: Deaf Person Dark Skin Tone
description: Represents a person with dark skin tone who is deaf, often indicated by a hand gesture near the ear. Used to signify deafness, communication without sound, or to represent the deaf community.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the deaf person emoji with a dark skin tone is rendered with a warm, rich complexion and smooth, sculpted features. The hand gesture, indicating 'hearing' or 'deaf,' is depicted with precise detail and soft, rounded edges characteristic of Apple's signature 3D design. This emoji on Apple devices conveys a powerful message of inclusion, communication, and understanding, celebrating diversity in digital conversations.
